profileAlternative.name: Aamir Syed
profileAlternative.headline: Microsoft SQL Server Consultant

positions.title: Sr. SQL Server Consultant
positions.description: Sr. SQL Server consultant providing support and solutions for various clients throughout the country.

positions.title: SQL Server Consultant
positions.description:
I optimize the speed, efficiency and stability of SQL Server…


With over fifteen years of experience in the world of IT, I have provided services for many types of organizations including major publishers, major financial firms, hedge funds, insurance companies, marketing companies and global non-profit organizations.



I can work for or with your Database team to help them find the root cause of your SQL Server problems. A slow database server can have a detrimental effect to your entire company.


To compound my specialty in performance tuning, I’m also well versed in migrations, planning, high-availability and Disaster recovery solutions and much more.
…
see more

positions.title: Contract MS SQL DBA
positions.description:
Conduct short- and long-term MSSQL Projects and planning to meet current and expanding business requirements
Recommend sound actions and control improvements
Performance Tuning, Query Optimization, using Performance Monitor, SQL Profiler and other related monitoring and troubleshooting tools
Provide 24x7 support for critical production systems- rotation deployment at night
Manage SQL Server databases through multiple product lifecycle environments, from development to mission-critical production systems.
Configure and maintain database servers and processes, including monitoring of system health and performance, to ensure high levels of performance, availability, and security.
Independently analyze, solve, and correct issues in real time, providing problem resolution end-to-end.
Refine and automate regular processes, track issues, and document changes
Assist developers with complex query tuning and schema refinement

given.text:
I had the great pleasure of having Aamir as one of my students in the Computer and Information Science program at St Thomas Aquinas College. Aamir was a very dedicated and responsible student. His participation in class contributed to the learning of his classmates and made classes more interesting and enjoyable for all. Because of his efforts and talent Aamir was in the top 5% of his class. I am very confident that Aamir will be an outstanding employee, coworker and learner in all types of environments. He is a trustworthy individual and someone who works hard to reach his goals and successfully complete any jobs assigned to him.
…
